item.title: Naked mole rats' DNA could hold key to long life
item.description: The bald, subterranean rats are the world's longest-lived rodent.

item.title: South African farm worker describes how women fed to pigs to 'dispose of evidence'
item.description: Adrian De Wet tells the South African court that "when pigs are hungry enough, they'll eat anything".

item.title: 'Joy and pain': Palestinians celebrate deal but fear confronting grief
item.description: People in Gaza celebrate a potential end to the war, but know it will mean facing the grief they have put aside.

item.title: NBA games back in China for first time since Hong Kong row
item.description: Two games in Macau this weekend will be the first since the league was effectively frozen out in 2019.

item.title: Police fire rubber bullets as Madagascar protesters reject president's promises
item.description: President Andry Rajoelina had promised to resign if he didn't fix the country's problems within a year.
